title: Good Omens If It Was A Romantic Comedy Film | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: So, who else is watching this on repeat?
Amazon Prime ships it, well, everyone ships it, Neil also said it was the same but with different music...

Neil Gaiman, on Twitter: "So it's exactly the same except for the music?" 
Me, a gay who has been dealing with Michael Sheen's absolutely feral brand of shipping for a year and just found out David Tennant refers to Aziraphale as "Az": thunks head loudly against table
i'm just imagining some employee sitting at their computer laughing until they're crying while making that thumbnail and it's made my day
whoever is running this account I LOVE YOU
description:
We just HAD to.
» SUBSCRIBE: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwSIJ...
